comments: Focusing on Speed is very important as you want Tingyun to generate SP as often as possible. Defensive stats should be preferred on a lower level Tingyun to ensure her survivability.
substats: Speed > HP% = DEF% = Effect RES = ATK% until ~2600 ATK
traces_priority: Jubilant Passage (A6) > Nourished Joviality (A2) > Knell Subdual (A4)
name: Support
